You sob and scream, pounding against the fleshy walls as you are squeezed down the kitten's throat. Soon, you are deposited in the cat's belly. The wrinkled flesh of the stomach is saturated with a hot, acidic liquid, and you cry out in pain as it burns every inch of exposed skin. Your hands and face are in agony, and your air is running out. You soon begin to suffocate, and pass out from oxygen deprivation.
You might have been dead, but...
121311222221.title: Getting too familiar with the cat.

choices: You were right, off you go!
Clutch to the lace for dear life
121312.content: As Mila headed for her next class, you bounced up and down with each step of her giant shoe. You feel like you're going to be flung by this lace you're hanging on to!
121312.title: Her next class

1213121.content:
Oh no! And just when you thought you would finally get some help. You fly into the air, whisked away from Mila. You see a hallway full of students, and close your eyes out of fear, hoping that you will receive a gentle landing, however impossible that may be.

Where do you land?
1213121.title: You were right, off you go!

12131211.content: You feel your descent into a tiny freefall, and, before you know it, you are saved by a light impact. Due to your size, the sudden change in velocity doesn't kill you. You are in total darkness though, save for the tiny bit of light coming in from where you fell in through. You faintly see zipper points lining the edges of the light, so you figure out that you're in someone's backpack. But who's?
12131211.title: Inside someone's backpack

121312111.content: The impact with the hard book cover didn't kill you, but it did leave you dazed, so it takes a while for you to rise to your feet again. The light coming through the zipper is enough for you to make out your surroundings. You are on top of a book, near you is a lunchbox, and on the opposite side of the backpack is a pink pencil case with a heart pattern. Reading the cover of the book, you see that it is entitled "Introduction to shapes and fractions," which you recognize as the second grade math workbook. From the textbook and the design on the pencil case, you believe that this backpack belongs to a six year-old girl in the second grade. Just as you finish making this deduction, a young girl with brown hair's face is visible for just a moment before the zipper is closed and the backpack is hoisted into the air, jostling the surroundings. You know that if you stay out in the open, you might get smashed between the moving objects in the bag. You quickly decide that it would probably be best to hide inside...
121312111.title: A younger girl's backpack

choices: The girl's huge hand reaches down to get something
121312112.content:
You ride the backpack to a classroom, and then your movement stops, as the pack is dropped to the floor. Slowly, you feel around and climb your way out. Though you can't see them enough to recognize them, the texture of some things in here confuse you. For example, you pass over something with tin foil, and make great use of a can-shaped object...

As you stand on the top of the backpack, looking out to the desks and feet of this class, you realize that this is an older group of students, more than likely eighth graders. You turn around and face your transportation's own desk. She is a tall, skinny girl with tan-ish skin and brown hair hanging past her shoulders, almost like your sister's. Except bigger. Well, you are shrunken, so that's obvious, but...you know what I mean. She is wearing shorts which expose most of her legs, and a vibrant t-shirt.

The school never much cared for a dress code anyway.

Suddenly, whilst taking in your surroundings...
121312112.title: An older girl

choices: A snack and a drink (the mysterious things you encountered earlier)
1213121121.content:
"All right, complete this worksheet by the end of the period and we'll go over it." The teacher hands out the work to the people in the front of the desk rows, who then pass it back, until everyone gets a paper. After the girl you're with gets hers, she reaches down, and her gigantic hand casts a dark shadow over you.

You are caught in her grasp as she lifts out...
1213121121.title: The girl's huge hand reaches down to get so...

12131211211.content:
Suddenly, you smash into that tin foil-y thing you climbed up just earlier, and are lifted out and onto the desk. Looking to your right, you see that the other item in question, the can-shaped one, was a soda.

"Fuck this work..." The girl thinks to herself, her stomach speaking louder than learning history today. She hadn't the chance to eat a lot of her lunch, so why not now?

You, in your childish naivety, are completely confused. Is this what older students do in class? Is eating instead of working even allowed?

The girl unwraps the tin foil (causing you to fall onto the desk), revealing a PB&J sandwich. With a loud, signature click, you heard the soda can being opened. From your position, you are looking up at a perfect angle to her face. She's pretty cute, and you especially notice her large blue eyes, as they look down, because she's trying to make it look like she's doing the work. Some of the students near her plainly notice, though.

You struggle to get back up, as that tumble was one too many falls for you. Since you were in a safe spot, though, you figured why not take your time and let your energy replenish.

The girl takes a huge bite of PB&J, chewing it up loudly, and then letting it die its merciless, slow death by swallowing it into her stomach. A few repeats and the sandwich is nearly gone.

Feeling more full, and more thirsty, the girl begins to drink her soda. As she's gulping down the fizzy drink, she spills some on her empty worksheet.

"Ah, shit." She mumbles to herself.

In a rush to dry the worksheet with something, she places her sandwich down...
12131211211.title: No eating in class

choices: You are being digested, and the lake is closing in on you
You are to some extent immune
121312112111.content:
"No no no nO NO NO NO!" You watch helplessly as a looming shadow quickly becomes a half-eaten PB&J weighing you down. The longer you lay with it on top of you, the more you are engulfed into the bread.

The girl crumples up the worksheet and puts it in her backpack, thinking she'll act like she never got one. That eliminates the spill issue and having to do the work! Feeling relieved, she picks up the rest of her sandwich and eats it all, with you stuck to the bottom of it.

You scream for dear life as you enter the girl's mouth and your back touches her slimy tongue. For some reason, she thinks nothing of you (as you might assume a tiny girl attached to a sandwich was not part of the original idea for PB&J), and proceeds to chew up the last of her quick lunch. You are moved out of the way by rushing streams of saliva. Disgusting, but it saves you from a brutal death under the pressure of the girl's teeth.

Once everything is good and chewed up, you are covered in it as she swallows. Her stomach rumbles with excitement.

You, on the verge of crying, are emptied along with your food mush company into the eighth grader's stomach. You spot bits of cereal remains from her breakfast, hiding amongst the new mixture of PB&J mush and stomach acid. Speaking of which, you shriek at the acid's touching of your skin. It burns like nothing else, and you instictively jump, landing back into the goopy mix, and splashing some more acid, droplets landing on your arms.

"Get away!!" You yell as you back towards a drier part of the girl's cavernous belly. "Let me out please!!!" You shout.

Outside, the girl sits, bored, looking around at people talking and doing their work. She chugs down the rest of her soda, and talks to her best friend near her.

You keep screaming for help, when all of a sudden, a great wash of soda floods the cavern, and brings you out towards the center. The fizzyness of the soda plus the stomach acid already giving you trouble makes your skin tingle in much pain. You struggle to swim away from the forming current keeping you in the pool.

Eventually, you do make it back to your dry spot, which has not been compromised...yet. You watch as the combination of everything in this girl's stomach begins to cause bubbles to form from the excess air and boiling lake.

"Okay, let's go over this work...Kayla, what is the answer to number 1?" The teacher asks the girl.

The girl responds with a deep and powerful burp. She didn't even mean to; the pressure snuck up on her. The student in front of her turns around, reeling back, disgusted at feeling the warm, smelly air hit the back of his neck.

You can't help but laugh, along with the rest of the class.

"...Heh heh...uh, sorry." Kayla apologizes half-heartedly. The teacher gives her detention.

Now, back to you. Are you really digesting, or can you actually survive the acid, besides the level of pain already established?
121312112111.title: Right on top of you

1213121121111.content:
The pool of Kayla's snack is inescapable. You try and try, but the soda and PB&J mush are all-encompassing, and nowhere in her stomach is safe. Kayla feels another burp coming on, a fact that you can back up as you see air escape her belly. Now, with almost no air, you are finding it hard to breathe. Your clothes are almost completely burned off at this point, and the pain is so much that your body is doing all it can to not feel it as much.

Kayla, back to doing her work, burps deeply in her mouth, and blows the hot air at her paper. Her stomach groans, churning the teen's snack.

You are squished between mush, acid, and the walls of Kayla's belly. Your body becomes an added source of nutrients for this eighth grader's growing body.

After class, Kayla burps again, the contents of her stomach now a much nicer unrecognizable homogenous glop. She doesn't recognize the taste of her burp, probably because she doesn't actually know that she ate you. With a shrug, Kayla walks off and enjoys the rest of her life.
1213121121111.title: Sarah is digested by the teenage girl

12133.content:
The shoe you were on belonged to Ms.Mcivor (Mick- I-ver). She was the mother of one of your friends and a 5th grade teacher at the school. It looked like you were on an athletic shoe so it must be gym time for her class. She usually wears classier shoes to school.

Ms.Mcivor walks down the hall until she enters the gymnasium where all her students are running around and screaming and playing.
12133.title: Ms. Giantess

choices: Stay here until after school ends.
122.content: You decide that it would be too dangerous to try to get on one of the shoes. If you missed, it would mean certain death. Instead, you decide to wait for the mob to pass, figuring that you can go somewhere once classes start and the kids aren't all in the halls. Slowly, the flood of students slows to a trickle, and then stops entirely as the bell goes off again. You think for a moment before deciding to...
122.title: Remain hidden

choices: She tries to step on you.
1221.content: Once the flood of children stops, you take off in the direction of the principal's office. You manage to get there easily. Outside of the office, there are two students sitting on a bench. Troublemakers sent to talk to the principal. One of them, a punk girl of about twelve, spots you as you run down the halls. What does she do?
1221.title: Head for the principal's office.

1222.content: You run towards the nurse's office, but you must have taken a wrong turn somewhere because you end up in the cafeteria. You look around for a second at the masses of people walking this way and that, carrying lunch trays and plates, when someone kicks you. Pain shoots through your body as you fly into the air. You land...
1222.title: Head for the school nurse.

choices: Thr food belongs to a girl your age
12221.content: Within whose food do you land?
12221.title: In someone's food.

choices: Nope, you're getting a ride to her mouth!
122211.content:
You splat right into someone's slice of pizza. Oh no! You have to get out of here; can't risk being eaten! You begin to struggle and squirm to get up and--

...You're stuck. Wonderful.

You see, from a frightening first-person viewpoint, the tray headed to a table with a few older girls, eighth graders. As your own girl sat down, you turned to look at her. She's a tall girl, with long, flowing brown hair, and striking blue eyes. Her skin is soft and slightly tan. As you take her massive size in, her gigantic hand reaches for her soda first, while her other rests nicely beside the pizza slice. She begins talking with her friends.

Can you break free yet?
122211.title: This may not end well

choices: You catch a ride on Katey's bookbag
You are flung from the tray
1222111.content:
The girl, in-between talking, begins to gulp down her soda. Thankfully, during this short period of time, you manage to struggle your way out of the binding cheese strands, and step off the slice and onto the tray.

You take a moment to collect yourself. A few more minutes, and you would've been food for a hungry teenage girl. Not a fun experience, you imagine. But, now you don't have to worry about that. The girl puts down her soda and takes a huge bite out of her slice, chewing it up and then sending it down into her slender, empty tummy.

Her friends also appear to be enjoying their lunches as well. You hope that one day (assuming you can get back to normal) that you have your close friends to each lunch with when you're their age.

"Woah, Katey," One of the friends references the girl, "That slice isn't going anywhere!" Katey swallows another bite and laughs.

"Well, I'd like it to go to my stomach before it gets the chance to change it's mind." She replies, engulfing another bite. You laugh at the irony of that statement, thinking of your almost-fate as food for Katey.

"Hey, how much bullshit was that math test?" The other friend asks, "We didn't even learn half the stuff on it! Mr. Johnston sucks."

"Here's what I think of math, and Mr. Johnston:" Katey grins, then burps proudly. The warm air has a strong stench of soda, mozzarella, and stomach acid.

"Ahh...yeah." Katey sighs.

"That was disgusting..." Her educationally-frustrated friend reacts, "...but awesome."

You sit on the lunch tray, feeling lucky that you didn't end up adding to Katey's belch, and continue to watch the girls talk and eat.

What happens when they're done?
1222111.title: Yeah! Time for an escape.

12221111.content:
You figure that, even though you were scared for your life of her just minutes ago, your best bet would be to follow your new giant "friend", so you climb into a pocket on Katey's bookbag. She gets up and leaves without any issue, and you are carried through the rest of her classes.

In Biology, the class learns about the digestive process (go figure). You hear Katey stifle back a burp, and it's obvious that a few students near her noticed too, evidenced by the weird looks and snickering. She thinks nothing of it, however.

In History, the class had a discussion about the rapid progression of technology in today's society, and what it could mean for the future. You wonder: are you this way because of some technology?

You fall asleep during that class, though, so when you wake up, you are at...
12221111.title: You catch a ride on Katey's bookbag

122211112.content:
Katey has thrown her bookbag onto her bed, and you've spilled out amongst other things, like writing utensils and books. Apparently, she wanted to start doing homework, but fell asleep herself, as you notice the gigantic body softly breathing near you. Up close, she's even more huge than you thought! You are nearly up against her bellybutton, and hear gurgling from inside. You always end up near her stomach...it's kind of disgusting at this point, to you, all the talk and hearing of digestion, eating, belching...you wish you could just get home already. Your family must be worried sick about you.

You look to your right, and see Katey's enormous feet hanging off her bed. It was obvious that they weren't just big because you were small. You decide to proceed up to her face, to wake her up.

When you get up there, you actually think it's kinda cute, her sleeping. She looks like a little kid. If it wasn't for her impressive height and deadly appetite, you could definitely see her as one.

Katey mumbles in her sleep, "...I want to eat them all..." She is even dreaming of food.

You tap on her cheek, and yell as loud as you can. Eventually, Katey opens her eyes.
122211112.title: Katey's home

choices: You are small enough to eat
1222111121.content:
Katey immediately sees you!

"What in the hell..." She says, half-asleep, noticing that you are somehow human, but an inch and a half tall.

"Uh...hi." You reply meekly. She is still threatening to you somewhat.

"...Hi." She replies, rubbing her eyes, "...How are you--"

"I don't really know. Can you help me...?" You answer her in a very innocent voice, as you simultaneously are afraid and realizing the gravity of your situation. You need help greatly.

Katey smiles in disbelief, "Me...help you...?"
1222111121.title: She sees you

12221111212.content:
"But...you are so small...and I'm sooo hungry. You are small enough to eat." Katey feels the emptiness of her stomach. Her lunch is completely gone, and that nap really heightened her hunger. You are petrified. She really won't help you...she's gonna eat you, exactly as you feared!!

You immediately turn and run, but Katey stops you, swinging her foot around. You are kicked down, the great force of her foot nearly knocking you out. In your weakened state, Katey picks you up.

"I must've dreamed you to be real..." Katey is slightly air-headed. "In my dream, there were all these little people, and I towered over them...I felt hungry, and ate them all. Boy, you should've heard the burp after that...it wasn't real, obviously, but still..." Katey realizes that she's trailing off.

"Well," She says, "Have fun, little snack."

Katey tosses you into her mouth. It is dark, and you are instantly drenched in saliva, swishing around. Katey loves the way you taste, a salty-sweet treat destined for her stomach. With one, strong gulp, you are swallowed whole.

"Ahh...stomach, go easy on her..." Katey's stomach rumbles loudly. "...Or not." Katey laughs.

You land with a plop in Katie's belly. It is extremely humid and smelly in the cavernous cauldron of all food's demise. You see the remains of old, resilient food, possibly from lunch today, stuck floating around in the pool of acid. Speaking of which, it starts to burn you. You scream in pain, and flail your arms and legs around involuntarily, beating on her stomach walls.

Katey giggles, enjoying your struggles. She belches, deeply and loudly, expelling the pressure built up from your futile efforts.

As you fall under the lake of acid, all you remember is how lucky you felt to not be eaten...but you were anyway. Katey is only half-full, so you see food falling in a bit after, in your last moments.

Katey forgot about you some time after covering you in new food. The last of you was simply burped out.
12221111212.title: You are small enough to eat

1222111122.content:
"Mhh..." Katey is woken by you, but doesn't see you. Slowly, she sits up in bed, rubbing her eyes.

"Ugghhh....soooo hungry...." Katey's stomach growls fiercely. "I was so full in my dream..." Katey sighs. She then lets out an airy belch, as her stomach's only content is some air at the moment.

You climb on to her hand, and she gets up and begins to walk to...
1222111122.title: She does not see you...yet

choices: You jump off at the last second.
Bye Sarah. Hope you're a good snack.
1222112.content:
The older girl gulps down some of her soda while you try to break free from your cheesy bonds. No luck. The girl puts down her soda, sighs contentedly, and prepares to chow down, lifting the pizza slice.

You watch in horror as her first bite comes dangerously close to your position, breaking off a large chunk. The next bite will be your death sentence.

The girl chews loudly, talking as she mashes up the pizza into a soft mush. After doing so, she quickly swallows, eager to take the next bite...

However, before she ends you as part of her lunch, she is caught off guard by a quickly arisen burp. She belts it out proudly, a deep, loud concoction from the murky depths of the hell that is her teenage belly. It's smell disgusts you; now you certainly don't to be eaten, as if you ever did.

Her friends laugh and poke fun at her for her obnoxious burp (apparently this is something that she does often). Feeling ready to continue devouring her pizza, the girl lifts the slice back to her mouth. You could almost touch her glistening white teeth, you are so close. Her warm pizza breath washes over you, an ominous welcome to her mouth.
1222112.title: Nope, you're getting a ride to her mouth!

choices: You go to a different person or leave alone
12221121.content:
There really is a god! The girl's first bite loosened the pizza's grip on you, so, right before she engulfs the rest of the pre-crust portion of the slice, you jump off and land on her lunch tray.

The eighth grade girl swallows her bite, feeling it drop into her stomach. While she is talking to her friends, you're just glad that you're not in that boiling cauldron of death, hearing it growl deeply.

As she finishes the slice, you almost feel bad for the pizza. It could not escape the hunger of the growing teenage girl, like you did. She belches loudly again, right into her friends' faces, a satisfied and mischievous grin across her face as the impressive burp ends.

"Ahh...what a slice." She says, "I can feel it inside me, slowly digesting into nothing..my belly digests anything." She starts getting excited, "I could even eat you and you'd be nothing but a burp in no time." She teases her friend, rubbing her tummy and guzzling the rest of her soda.
12221121.title: You jump off at the last second!

choices: You are at the mercy of the girl's stomach (hint: there is no mercy)
12221122.content:
The cute teenage girl takes a huge bite, engulfing you into her warm cavernous mouth, glistening with saliva. At the back of the giant cave, you could see her uvula and the entrance to her throat. You are quickly thrown off the portion of pizza now, as the girl rips through it eagerly, smashing and swishing the food into mush. You are absolutely terrified. Are you about to die in an older girl's stomach?! The very thought of it shakes you to your core. You remember the power and velocity of her belch just minutes earlier, and hear her stomach growl fiercely below. Her stomach does not sound like it takes any prisoners.

With a slight tilt of her head, the 14-year-old swallows you and the pizza. She exhales, feeling you slide down her throat and drop into her stomach. You are going to become nourishment for her tall, slender growing body.

Knee-deep in a thick mass of chewed-up pizza and fizzling soda, you begin to seriously panic. Her stomach smells like mozzarella and cola, and you can hardly breathe in that humid air. Just as you make it to the wall of the girl's rumbly belly, hoping to get her attention by pounding on it, her stomach fiercely shakes, as it emits an obnoxious groan, awaiting the final piece of the slice.

Outside, the girl talks to her friends. "I bet I could chug the rest of this soda." She says, lifting it in her free hand (she just shoved the rest of the pizza into her mouth with the other).

Her friends egg her on. So, just as you are covered by the entering pizza mush, a new threat is fast approaching!

The girl begins forcefully gulping down soda, and her friends watch as the sugary drink flows down her throat. With a pounding thunk, the girl slams down her empty soda bottle back onto the table in victory.

You barely can keep your head above this thrashing ocean of cold, fizzy soda. This truly is the end for you. On the bright side, you were a protein-packed addition to the teenage girl's lunch.

The 14-year-old smiles cutely, then unleashes an astonishingly deep and amazingly lengthy burp, a loud and proud symbol of her achievement. Her friends just stare, one with her jaw dropped.

"That. Was. Awesome." One remarks.

Are you going to be digested, or do you miraculously survive?
12221122.title: Bye Sarah. Hope you're a good snack.

122211221.content: You are endlessly churned inside of the teen girl's unforgiving stomach. After a while, you can't even struggle, slipping into an unconscious state. The girl feels her stomach working busily, and enjoys it very much. She feels full, and burps again, getting up to head to her next class. Inside her stomach, you and her lunch are turned into a nutritious soup, destined to be energy for her for the rest of the day. At least you helped her feel good and energized. In class, her stomach let out one last loud, embarrassing groan, ending its fight against you.
122211221.title: You are at the mercy of the girl's stomach ...

choices: The girl (named Katie) decides to keep you.
The girl (named Katie) decides to show you to an adult.
122211222.content:
The bubbles from the fizzy drink inflate the girl's stomach with air, but it is carbon dioxide: you can't breathe it in. As a result, with every burp the air grows thinner. You start to get lightheaded from oxygen deprivation.
Meanwhile, outside, the girl is reveling in her victory over the soda. "I didn't think that you could do it," one girl remarks.
"Well *urp* I'm full of surprises," the girl declares, belching slightly.
"You just drank a ton of soda, you could probably do some really sick burps," another friend suggests.
"Yeah!" another girl agrees. The girl whose stomach you inhabit chuckles, before letting out a large belch that nearly totally voids her stomach of air. You are choking on the gas which is almost totally CO2 by now.
"Hang on, I can do better," she says, burping again. Now there is no air at all left in her belly, and you are forced under the fizzy surface of the cola as the only void is removed.
"One more," she declares, trying to burp once more. There's no air left in her stomach, though, so all that happens is that some of the mixture of soda, acid, pizza, and tiny girl are pushed up her esophagus. Back in her mouth now, you immediately grab out for anything that might help you to avoid being swallowed again. You hold a molar tightly in both hands as the girl swallows down the mouthful of vomit.
"Ugh, almost threw up," the girl says, the sound echoing around you. You have successfully avoided being eaten again. Then, the girl makes a face of confusion as she detects your presence.
"What the...?" she says aloud, and her tongue writhes back to try to dislodge you, but it can barely touch the top of your head, and you hold on tightly. She closes her teeth, but you are holding onto the sides of the molar and not the top of it.
"What's up?" one of the other girls asks.
"There something in my mouth. Something hairy," the girl says. She had only been able to touch your head, so she would have felt your hair.
"Eww! spit it out!" the girl's friend exclaims.
"I can't, it's stuck!" the girl says.
"Grab it and pull it out!" the friend suggests. The mouth opens wide and two huge fingers reach in and grab you around the waist. You release your grip on the tooth as she pulls you out of her mouth and examines you. You wipe the hair out of your face and stare into her eyes, which grow wide with surprise.
"What is that?" the friend asks.
"It's... It's a tiny girl," the girl who is holding you exclaims. Now all eyes at the table are on you. What does this girl decide to do?
122211222.title: You...are still alive!

choices: You get in without a problem
Something happens as you go to get in
1222112221.content:
"Uh...hi." You say nervously, feeling the sets of eyes staring at you, the most prominent of which being those of the girl who just ate you.

"How...did you get in my mouth...?" Katie asks. You figured that anyone's first question would be "HOW DID YOU GET SO SMALL?", but you'd probably ask the same thing if you were in this girl's situation.

You point at the crumbs on the empty plate, letting her know that she ate you with the pizza. Katie's eyes are still wide with surprise, but she giggles a little.

"Oh, I guess I didn't see you...sorry." Katie offers a half-hearted apology, putting you down onto the table.

"Ask her for her name!" One of Katie's friends suggests.

"Oh, okay...what's your name? I'm Katie."

You reply, "Sarah."

Another one of Katie's friends leans in to ask you, "Did you hear Katie's burping while you were in there?"

You look at the girl and nod, your face expressing how shaken and surprised you were. You raise your hands to your head and make a "mind-blown" gesture, since this girl probably wouldn't hear you if you said something.

Everyone laughs at your reaction, especially Katie.

"I like you, Sarah." Katie decides.

Right then, the bell rings, signaling that lunchtime is over. Everyone gets up to head to class. Katie picks up her backpack and brings it up to the table.

"You can ride in here, okay?" She gestures towards a small pocket.
1222112221.title: Katie keeps you

choices: Makenna thinks Katie is crazy for giving a name to a crumb
Makenna recognizes you as a person
12221122212.content:
As you step closer to hitch a ride with your new giant friend, another girl walks over. A classmate of Katie's, this girl has blonde hair and steel blue eyes. She is wearing a purple sleeveless shirt and black short shorts.

"...Um, Katie...why are you talking to the table?" She asks, confused.

"Oh, hey Makenna." Katie looks down to you. "Sarah, meet Makenna." As Katie mentioned you, it seemed as though this girl Makenna finally was able to see you.
12221122212.title: Something happens as you go to get in

choices: Makenna puts an end to you
122211222121.content:
"Katie, you're so weird sometimes." Makenna comments, reaching for you. Suddenly, you are caught in the grasp of the young teen's thumb and index finger. You feel like you're almost being crushed. This seems really out of place for a reaction to an introduction...unless...somehow...

"Woah, woah, Makenna, what are you doing?" Katie turns and tries to get you back. Unfortunately, the swiftness of Makenna's actions delayed Katie's reaction time, so Makenna was already holding you out of reach. (Katie and Makenna are the same height.)

"Dude, it's just a piece of food you gave a name, relax." Makenna responds.

What could possibly transpire next...
122211222121.title: You = Crumb? Alright then.

choices: Katie stops Makenna and finally gets a chance to explain
Makenna leaves Katie before she can explain...you're stuck with a new "friend"
1222112221211.content:
Katie stood terrified as she watched Makenna drop you. You fell into Makenna's mouth, smelling her pizza breath on the way in. She closed it shut, and swallowed you. Great. You had what, five minutes between being eaten the first time?

Makenna turns back to Katie, who wore an expression of fear. Makenna mistakes it for Katie being somehow angry. "Come on, you can't seriously be mad I ate that crumb. Oh, sorry, I mean 'Sarah'." Makenna giggles.

You fall into Makenna's stomach in no time, landing amongst a lake of liquid-y digesting mush. Her lunch is already pretty far from being the pizza it started out as. Desperate for this girl to understand you are actually a person, you start pounding on the stomach walls. In truth, you were not as scared as when you were inside Katie, since, of course, you have that experience already.

Makenna heads for the door of the cafeteria, and lets out a small burp, releasing the excess air you are freeing with your efforts.
1222112221211.title: Makenna puts an end to you

choices: Her lunch comes rushing diwn into the toilet
12221122212111.content:
You are floating inside Makenna's stomach as it churned on its contents for one last time. Makenna's lunch was already quite digested.

"Perfect! I just got out of Katie's stomach, and I am back into another stomach!!", you shout angrily. Then you hear the sounds of speech on the other side of the stomach walls and what you hear just makes you want to die. Just a crumb...

All of a sudden, your environment starts shaking and the nutritious soup starts mashing you around in Makenna's huge stomach. She must be walking you assume. Just then air rushes out of the stomach and you hear a very petite burp.

Katie gets up from her chair and runs after Makenna after.a small delay. She grabs Makenna on her shoulder and turns so they face each other. "That was not a crumb, she was a small girl named Sarah, and you ate her!" Katie told Makenna.

"Sure, and I can play violin!" Makenna said, laughing. Just then Katie's friends who have been sitting with her on the table came and confirmed what Katie was saying.

"So I ate a small girl? Oh my god!" she yelped Makenna suddenly. She and Katie rushed to the bathroom, and entered a stall. Just as they entered the stall, a small burp escaped Makenna's lips, followed by a heavy gurgle and several more following it. Katie and Makenna looks at each other for a second, then Makenna bend over the toilet and pushes her fingers down her throat. When her gag reflex kicks in she quickly pulls her fingers out and bends over the toilet more.
12221122212111.title: Katie stops Makenna and finally gets a chance t...

choices: Makenna has something she must apoligize for...
122211222121112.content:
Makenna desperately tries to throw up her meal, to save the little girl she just ate. She gags a few more times and finally she throws up. But all that came out was just some gastric juices. Both Katie and Makenna looks into the toilet, trying to find Sarah, but they can't. Just then Makenna's stomach makes a monstrous gurgling sound, causing Makenna to put her hands on her belly.

Katie looks with fear to the teenage girl that just ate the little girl she met not long ago. "She's... She's gone, into your intestines?" asks Katie.

"Umm. Seems so. Oh god, I just ate someone.!" says Makenna with a sad voice. Just then her stomach grumbles once more, but this time, more deeply. Katie, having no wish to hear how a small girl gets digested, leaves the stall without saying anything.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -

Sarah suddenly feels a change in the way Makenna's stomach muscles move. Then with distusting gurgling and grumbling sounds, the lunch of the teenage girl who ate the unfortunate Sarah starts to drain into her intestines. Having used all her strength, Sarah tries to grab the spinchter that leads to Makenna's duodenum, but to no avail. The rushing mush that once used to be a pizza brings her along with the rest of the mush into the intestines. Soon after the spinchter shuts tight, and gagging noises can be heard.

"It's too late..." is all Sarah could say. The current keeps pulling her deeper. She hears Katie's voice, hear her ask the obvious. Her friend anwsers, "Umm. Seems so. Oh god, I just ate someone!".

Sarah feels fatigue start to take over. She slowly shuts her eyes, "I am.... just a.. crumb?..", snd her breathing vanished, along with the life left in her. Makenna's intestines, now ready to digest Makenna's lunch and Sarah along with it, grumble deeply intheir glory.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Katie leaves the bathroom, knowing full well that the little girl was no more, she felt feelings well up in her heart, tears in her eyes. "I am sorry..." she whispers, and slowly returns to her classroom.
122211222121112.title: Nothing comes out.

122212.content: You land flat on top of a sandwich carried by a 9 year old girl. She has silky blonde hair, big green eyes, and pale skin. She is sitting at a table with a big group of friends. Does she immediately gobble up the sandwich?
122212.title: The food belongs to a girl your age

1222122.content: The girl picks up the sandwich and brings it to her mouth. Fortunately, you are lying, dazed, in the middle of the spongy bread, so she doesn't take you with the small hunk of food. You gather your wits and scramble away from her face with some difficulty, since the bread makes it difficult to get solid footing. The girl seems not to be in any sort of hurry, so you have plenty of time to crawl your way to any part of the sandwich that you please. Obviously crawling towards the side that she's eating is a terrible idea, but you have a couple choices to consider. You can either try to jump from the back side of the sandwich and try to land on the table, or you can try to crawl over the girl's hands.
1222122.title: No, she takes her time.

12221221.content: You have a bad feeling that if you touch her hand, this girl might panic and fling you across the room. Jumping to the table is definitely your safest bet. With some difficulty, you make your way to the back of the sandwich.
12221221.title: Jump for it!

122212211.content: You are afraid of heights, so you don't want to look down. Instead, you close your eyes, muster your courage, and fling yourself off the crust of the bread. You are only falling for a fraction of a second before you collide with...
122212211.title: A leap of faith.

choices: "Cindy, wait! I saw something fall into that!"
The girl starts to drink her milk.
1222122112.content:
You strike a shockingly cold liquid, and thrash about. Fortunately you can swim a little bit, and you fight your way to the surface. You shake your head to get the hair away from your face, and open your eyes. You are swimming in a sea of white. In the distance, you can see the plastic cup with its frosted-glass-like design. Already, you're beginning to get tired. You know you can't tread water--er, milk--for much longer. Then, through the distorted cylindrical walls, you can see a hand grasp the cup and bring it up to the girl's face.

Then...
1222122112.title: An icy cold error.

12221221121.content:
Just as the green-eyed girl is about to start drinking the milk, you hear another voice speak.
"Cindy, wait! I saw something fall into that!" another young girl's voice says. You see the massive green eyes widen momentarily with surprise, and then they focus on you. You wave to her, and in doing so briefly dip below the surface of the milk. The girl, whose name you assume is Cindy, yelps in surprise, and drops the cup.
For the next couple of seconds, your world is a maelstrom of white as milk splashes and spills all over the place. You end up somewhere on...
12221221121.title: Don't cry about it.

122212211211.content:
You are on the table and try to run away from the boulder sized crumbs falling.
You run, untill you think you are safe standing on a giant metal object under the girl next to Cindy's head. You see her come back while holding a napkin and you realize what you are on, but it is too late. The girl comes and cleans the top of the fork with a napkin, but sends the bottom of the fork up, where you are.
You go flying across the cafeteria until you end up landing on some strange solid object. You notice that it is another person's food and the food is...
122212211211.title: The Strange Metal Object

choices: The face of a girl your age
The face of an older girl
1222122112112.content:
You soar over tables and the heads of students, slowly descending. You close your eyes and hope for the best!

Suddenly, you bounce onto something...it is kind of binding, not sticky, but it still feels like its grabbing you. You also smell something along the lines of...

...Pizza. Crap! How are you going to get out of this? You open your eyes and are met with...
1222122112112.title: A slice of pizza

choices: Skyler finishes her lunch, and you survive
Skyler's friends dare her to finish her pizza and chug her soda...bad for you
12221221121121.content:
You look up into the hungry face of a girl your age. She is skinny and sort of tall, with straight blonde-ish hair hanging down a bit over her shoulders. You don't recognize her, but that doesn't make the situation any better! As you stand, you find that it is easier than you thought, but then you notice that you are still stuck to the cheese, it's just that the strands holding you are coming with you!

"Guys, what if like there was a bug on my pizza right now," The girl is talking to her friends, ironically about a hypothetical situation that is almost literally happening, "And I just wasn't paying attention..."

The girl lifts the half-eaten slice you are on, just as you felt like you could break the chains binding you to her lunch! You shriek as you see her huge mouth open, revealing a young set of white teeth and a fearsome tongue, not to mention the saliva everywhere and that ominous black hole at the back, beckoning you to her throat.

The girl continues, "So, I just went *chomp*," She engulfs you and some pepperoni bits, toppings on her big bite, "and chewed it up," She goes on, with her mouth full. Luckily for you, the cheese that screwed you over earlier wraps around you, freeing you from the greater piece of pizza that the girl chews into mush.

"...and then, *gulp*" She swallows her mouthful, "I swallow it and it dies in my tummy. Wouldn't that be cool?" The girl laughs and drinks some of her soda.

"No!" One of her friends responds, "Not for the bug!"

"Well, of course, hahaha, I didn't mean the bug! It would just be cool to eat something alive."

"...You're weird, Skyler." A boy nearby overhears the conversation.

"Shut up." Skyler drinks more soda.

You personally find the role of the bug relatable, as you are now standing in Skyler's stomach yourself. It is a nice-sized cavern, expanded a little to fit the pizza she's been eating, now little more than mush in a big, soggy pile, starting to be boiled in stomach acid. You've found a small, drier patch that doesn't seem to have a dangerous amount of acid near it yet, so for right now, you're safe...

...That is, until the great waterfalls of soda flood in, and whisk you away into the middle of it all. It's actually not as bad as you thought, since swimming in the soda lake keeps you above the floor and therefore above the stomach acid for a bit, but the soda itself is kinda uncomfortable and burning too. It's bubbly surface fills Skyler's belly with lots of gas, and it rumbles, slightly bloated.

"Oof, too much soda..." Skyler puts her hand to her tummy, then suddenly burps loudly. This removes a lot of air for you, so now you're swimming and struggling to breathe, but it greatly relieves her.

"Ah, that's better." Skyler giggles and smells the air. "Huh, I smell pepperoni." She points out.

What happens next?
12221221121121.title: Eaten by a girl your age

choices: Still burpy, while you start to digest
122212211211212.content:
"Hey Sky," one of Skyler's friends began, "I dare you to eat the rest of your pizza in one bite!"

"You're on!" She replies.

Inside of Skyler's belly, you watch gasping for the small amount of air as the pizza and soda mush is churned about, sizzling in preteen girl stomach acid. Ironically, you want to get out and get more air to breathe at the same time, but since there's only one way for the air to come in first...should that be the case, you'd likely not end up getting out.

Skyler meanwhile shoves the mostly-crust remaining portion of her pizza slice into her mouth. Her cheeks bulge out to take it all in. In a hilariously muffled voice, she seems to start bragging about being able to eat it all at once.

After a good round of chewing, Skyler gulps forcefully and sends it all down to where you are. The new mush spills into her tummy and immediately hits the acid. Such a reaction starts releasing more air into the cavern, as pockets from the pizza dough are rapidly deconstructed.

"Wow!" The boy from before exclaims in disbelief, as Skyler licks her fingers clean. "But I bet you can't finish your soda after that!"

Skyler hears her stomach rumble deeply. She is quite full already, and would have been even worse had it not been for that burp earlier. But...she has to do it! For lunch table glory!!

"Bet I can!" Skyler starts gulping down soda continuously. The tumultuous waterfall returns, this time even more powerful and disruptive. A current forms and carries you into the thick of the pizza remains and stomach acid. Now, the acid is really burning and you cry out in great pain.

Of course, Skyler can't hear you over the roar of the lunchroom, her tummy's own crying out in various noises, and her concentration on finishing her drink.

Finally, Skyler slams the can down on the table and crushes it. "Woo!!" She exclaims, proud of herself. In contrast, her stomach is quite upset, of which you are experiencing firsthand in burning up in its mess of food and gases. Skyler belches massively and proudly, and this alleviates a little of her belly's pain, but as you are well aware there's plenty more where that came from if she wants to let all this new air out.
122212211211212.title: Dared to the Death

choices: She made it, you land in a toilet.
She didn't make it, you land on the floor.
1222122112112121.content:
As Skyler begins to belch once more, you take a deep breath of what air remains. It's a good thing you did so, because with a final belch, every last bit of air is expelled from her belly. Now you know you're in trouble!
Outside, Skyler opens her mouth to belch again, but nothing comes out. She seems confused for a moment, and tries again, to no avail. Her eyes widen, and there are scattered words of alarm and concern as she leaps from her seat and sprints towards the ladies' room.
You are having trouble holding your breath, and something strange is happening. The walls of the stomach are undulating, pushing the mash around and pressing you between more solid bits of food. You don't resist the movement, choosing instead to focus on holding your breath. Then the movement intensifies, and all of the contents of Skyler's stomach erupt from her mouth. You catch a mouthful of air as you fall.
Did Skyler make it to the bathroom?
1222122112112121.title: She starts to feel sick

12221221121121212.content: Fortunately, you were not the first thing to leave Skyler's mouth, and your fall is cushioned slightly by a shallow pool of vomit. Unfortunately, you were not the last, and you are covered once more in the former contents of the girl's belly. Besides Skyler continuing to retch, you can hear a crowd of children laughing and jeering, and for the first time, you feel a bit sorry for her. It would be a long time before she lived this down. You push the layer of puke off of yourself and breathe again. The air smells slightly more fresh than the air within her stomach--though only slightly. As you crawl free of the sludge, you take in your surroundings. Skyler is doubled over, clutching her stomach. Her hair is dangling in clumps in front of her face, almost reaching into the pool of puke. The tips of her hair seem to have gotten caught in the explosive expulsion, and they are wet with the same yellowish liquid that covers your body and clothes. You are just outside the entrance to the girls' bathroom, and a bit of the fluid has splashed onto the door. A slightly longer distance away is the exit to the cafeteria, which leads out into a hallway. You aren't immediately sure where to go, but you know that you shouldn't stay here. The janitor would be on his way, and the last thing you want is to get washed away. You rise to your feet and run towards...
12221221121121212.title: She didn't make it, you land on the floor.

choices: Chew the gum you are loudly around her mouth
Blow fairly big bubbles with the gum you are on
122212211211212122.content: You go into the hallway and don't see anyone around. Then you start to see people leave the cafeteria and enter their classrooms. You follow Skyler into her math classroom she is having and is going to. Looking around the room, you try to find a way to get Skyler's attention. When you see her sitting down, you start to climb onto her and try to land on her desk. Class starts and the teacher had startd to talk and put math problems on the board. Everyone in the classroom starts talking about what they think the answer may be. This throws you off balance, but you land on her desk without having any harm. However, you fall onto a stick of gum from an open gum packet Skyler is about to chew. She picks up the gum and you realize that the is no alternative besides being still and waiting to see what will happen. Skyler then puts the rest of her gum packet away and puts the one you are on in her mouth. Skyler starts to chew the gum in her mouth with you in it. The teacher sees Skyler chewing her gum and says "You can chew your gum Skyler, but try not to be too much of a distraction with it. Skyler is not sure what to do with her gum that is fun, but not too distracting. She thinks of two different options that she would be interesting in trying. Skyler thinks about chewing her gum loudly all around her mouth, but not being too loud. She also has the idea of blowing fairly big bubbles with the gum out of her mouth. For these reasons, she decides to...
122212211211212122.title: The hallway

1222122112112121221.content:
Skyler thinks about chewing her gum loudly all around her mouth, but not being too loud. She also has the idea of blowing fairly big bubbles with the gum out of her mouth. For these reasons, she decides to chew the gum you were on loudly but yet not enough to get her in trouble.



As she started to chew you quickly roll to the the side and onto Skyler's tongue.
After a few chew she stops feeling something weird in other words you her shock pushes you to the back of her mouth and reflexes make her swallow.


Soon you are yet again inside a stomach.
1222122112112121221.title: Chew the gum you are loudly around her mouth

12221221121121212212.content:
Great. Here you are again! It's seems fate wants to make you little girl food today. Skyler's stomach, emptied quite a bit from her puking earlier, eagerly accepts you as a fitting replacement for what was lost. You can barely see the half-digested glop of what stayed still bubbling and boiling away, but the faint light in her tummy gives you just enough of a glimpse for you to realize that that will be you soon.

You start crying. How could you survive being eaten once, only to end up eaten again? Unfortunately, your despair bars you from making any headway on escaping, and even with all the struggling in the world, last time's lucky break was due in part to the girl's own overeating, and you don't have that on your side this time.

A moment later, Sky's stomach acid creeps up onto your body. The burning-hot splashes tingle at your skin and quickly lead to a sharp, searing pain. You scream out in sheer pain, but your wailing is received by no one. Little streams of sugary liquid coming from her chewing gum drip into her stomach after coating her throat all the way down. Some of it drips on to you, and it's the last flavor you taste. Talk about a bittersweet moment.

Outside, Skyler's tummy gurgles, thankfully not loud enough to disturb the class, but strongly enough that the young girl definitely feels and hears it, much to her pleasure and amusement. She finds it weird that she is feeling strangely full even after throwing up, and questions to herself if she really ate that much lunch. The mystery goes happily unsolved and she contentedly pats her busy stomach under her shirt. A quiet burp escapes her as she half-attentively listens to her teacher's lecture.

Your body, well, it's beyond hope at this point. Not only are you sufficiently dead, but Sky's powerful stomach acid has melted everything recognizable of you. Your bones are the most structurally sound pieces left, floating around in the bubbly lake of former food. A few of them will probably come back up in a massive burp later when Sky eats dinner, and that meal meets the same horrible humid boiling fate.
12221221121121212212.title: Digested

1222122112112122.content:
You are almost buried in a pile of chewed-up pizza and bubbling soda. And even though you're keeping your head above "water" successfully so far, the air you are rewarded with is little more than a humid cloud of what a young girl's stomach smells like. Skyler's belly makes a loud gurgling sound, and all the contents shake yet again. At this rate, you will be digested for sure.

Skyler relaxes in her seat as her tummy loudly works to boil its lunch. Several small and powerful burps escape her as the excess air is being forced out of her stomach. Pretty soon, all that will be left of you will be little undigested bits that Sky will burp out.

You need to get out of here. Now.
1222122112112122.title: For Whom the Burp Tolls

12221221121121222.content:
Skyler happily rubs her rounded, bloated belly as the bell rings and lunch ends. You are quickly forgotten. That only means one thing...you are little girl food.

In her next class, Skyler's stomach provides a humorous additional soundtrack to a class movie, for those nearby. It constantly gurgles and groans, working extra hard to churn the mass of food and soda stewing inside of her. Your body's somewhere in that.

Sky pats her noisy tummy and suppresses a big burp so the class isn't greeted by the volume and aroma of a little girl's massive belch.

What an awesome meal.
12221221121121222.title: Sky's stomach overtakes you

choices: Eat up! We gotta go study before class.
12221221121122.content:
An eighth-grade girl heads to meet her friends at one of the lunch tables. Even at normal size some of the middle schoolers seemed to tower over you, and this girl, already 5 foot and a few inches, fit that bill a few times over now that you're small enough to be a pizza topping for her.

Once that thought hits you, you start visibly shaking in your cheesy bindings. This young teen, with wavy brown hair in long strands going a little past her shoulders and over her developing boobs, big gray-blue eyes, and an endearing down-to-earth smile is very very close to ending your life without even knowing it. If she doesn't see you as anything other than food, you die inside of her.

You've seen some of the eighth-graders eating together once. It was so rowdy, and messy...they shoveled their food into their mouths in-between talking and messing around without even thinking about it...would this girl eat you like that? Like nothing? And what becomes of the food once it goes inside those giant kids...? Is it just vaporized immediately, or is it slower and more painful? Would this girl even feel you in her stomach if she did eat you? And there were so many loud burps after...do all middle-schoolers do that after they eat? Is that what your life and body are going to be? Part of some teen girl's after-lunch big kid super belch?

You shudder and start to cry, imagining your melting body stewing in a bath of pizza while this cute girl pats her gurgling tummy and lets out a proud *UUUUUUUURRP* to the amusement of her friends...

"Uhh, hey, Victoria..." One of the girl's friends grabs her attention while you keep scaring yourself.
12221221121122.title: Intimidation of the Tallest Order

122212211211222.content:
The girl nods and lifts up her pizza to her mouth. You don’t even have time to yell as she shoves the whole slice in. The world around you goes dark, but you’re tossed around with the tongue as you hear the girl chewing her food. You’re soon covered in grease and cheese from ramming into the food. Before you knew it, all of the food in the girl’s mouth starts to travel to her throat, pushing you with it. Though it’s dark, you can see the outline of the hole and try to get away from it.

“No! Please!” You yell before being knocked down into her throat headfirst. You had lost your footwear during the chaos at some point so you could feel the gooey cheese on your feet, pushing you down deeper. You yelled, soon falling into the stomach. As you tried to pull your face out of the acid, the rest of the pizza slice quickly landed on you. You were pulled under the stomach acids, unable to get free. After struggling the best you could, you quickly lost conscience. The girl who ate you never learned of what she did.
122212211211222.title: One way in, fast food style

choices: Swim to the floating sponge nearby.
122212211212.content:
After regaining your senses, you realize that you are stuck to the left leg of someone's green shorts. Stuck, because the sugars in the milk seem to have glued you in place.
"Ack! What was that for?" the voice that had previously warned Cindy about the milk exclaimed.
"I-I... There was a girl in my milk!" Cindy, obviously flustered, stammered.
"What? Are you feeling all right?" the voice asked.
"Well now I'm all wet, and, and..." Cindy said, her voice growing higher and higher pitched with each word.
"Aw jeez, don't cry..." the voice started to say, but it was too late. Cindy began to bawl, attracting the attention of several teachers. One rushed over and helped Cindy stand up.
"It's okay, sweetie, it's okay," the male teacher said in a soothing voice. You could see the teacher. He was clearly an older man. He was wearing a suit and tie, and had short, grey hair. It was Mr. Ghastly, a fifth grade history teacher with a very good reputation among the students. Providing Cindy with a steady stream of assurances that everything would be fine, he escorted her to the school's main office.
"Is your mother at home?" Mr. Ghastly asked. Cindy sniffed and nodded. The teacher handed her a tissue and, referencing a list of numbers by the phone, pushed seven buttons. After a few seconds of holding the phone to his ear, he started to talk.
"Hi, is this Cindy Werner's mother? Yes, Hi, I'm one of the teachers. No, no, no trouble, but Cindy's had a bit of an accident and I think it would be best if--no, she's not injured, don't worry,--if you took her back home early today. Yes, I'll tell them. Thank you for your time, ma'am." Then, turning to Cindy, he smiled. "Your mother will be here shortly, you get to go home early."
"Mister, there was a little girl in my milk," Cindy whispered.
"Now now, I know you're upset, but you don't need to start telling tall tales," the teacher said.
"But I really..." Cindy started to say, but never finished the thought.

Apparently, Cindy lived quite nearby, because her mother arrived within five minutes.
"I'm terribly sorry about that, sir," Cindy's Mother said to Mr. Ghastly.
"It's no trouble, ma'am. Just get her home and cleaned up."
Cindy was lead out to her mother's car, and within five minutes they were at their destination. Through the whole ride, you were trying to free yourself from Cindy's shorts, but to no avail.
"Alright, you go upstairs and get cleaned up," Miss Werner said. Cindy climbed up the long staircase, and removed her shorts, which resulted in your view being totally obstructed as the cloth covered you. You hear the sounds of cloth rustling, and after about a minute the shorts are picked up, and Cindy's hand happens to be covering you, so you still can't see, but you feel her going down the stairs. Then, Cindy drops all of her clothes, and at long last you stop being stuck to her shorts, but now you're stuck to her hand. Still, you can see again. Below you, you can see Cindy's clothes in a laundry basket, as well as Cindy's lower body, which is covered by a towel. Looking up, you can see that Cindy is fully naked other than a towel which is wrapped around her. She climbs back up the stairs and into the bathroom, where her mother had apparently already prepared a bath for her. Cindy drops the towel, and climbs into the bath. Instantly, you become unstuck, and you are swimming again. You know that you'll need to get help with floating, or you might drown.
122212211212.title: Stuck on Cindy.

1222122112122.content: You make your way over to the sponge that is floating nearby and clamber onto it. It rocks back and forth unsteadily, but you can take a short rest. You close your eyes for a moment, just a moment, and suddenly the sponge is moving. Oops, you forgot that people actually use sponges when they're in the bath. To make things worse, you're on the slightly abrasive side of it, so Cindy is rubbing you between her slippery skin and the rough surface of the sponge. She scrubs her front, her back, and her arms. Then she moves to her legs, which are underwater. Your breath isn't going to last very long under the surface, especially not with her squeezing you between her body and the sponge. You nearly pass out on the first leg, but you manage to take a breath between legs. The second leg she washes more hastily, so you have an easier time with that part. Now she's finished with her limbs and torso, so she moves on to her face. Rubbing you against her face, she notices that something is not quite right when she's washing her forehead. She lifts the sponge off of her face and looks up at it, holding it above her head. She spots you and gasps, and in shock she once again drops what she's holding. In this case, the sponge with you on it. The sponge falls and bounces off of her face, depositing you right inside of her gaping mouth. She inhales deeply to try to scream, sucking you down her throat, into her windpipe. She chokes, suddenly unable to breathe as an inch and a half tall girl obstructs her lungs. She gags and tries to cough, both of you attempting to dislodge this obstruction from her windpipe. Suddenly, you fly free of her mouth and fly a good foot or two before landing...
1222122112122.title: Swim to the floating sponge nearby

12221221121222.content:
Cindy, having now seen you twice, searches frantically for you.
"Am I just going nuts?" Cindy wonders aloud. Cindy looks all around the bathtub, but she fails to notice you lying, stunned, on her towel. Cindy shakes her head, and you hear a "pop" as she unplugs the bathtub's drain.
"I think I just need some rest," she decides, stepping out of the bath and picking up the towel. You instinctively grab onto the fibrous material of the towel, not wanting to fall to the tile floor below.
