Sarah felt extreme pressure and rubbing from within Nicole’s giant mouth. It felt like Nicole was going to split her in half seeking more of Sarah’s juices. Nicole felt another tiny bump between Sarah’s legs. She focused her attention on it. Nicole was rewarded for her attention as she lapped up that same taste. This continued until she felt her doll shudder and slump. This vibration was accompanied by a huge blast of flavor.

Nicole sucked Sarah’s legs as she pulled her out to clear off any saliva. She smiled at how red she made Sarah’s tiny body. She noticed that Sarah was beginning to snooze, Sarah had her fill of fun for today. Nicole wasn’t done though. She toyed with Sarah’s body, seeing how many ways she could bend and fold her, testing how far her joints would bend. Sarah remained fairly sedate, only yelping occasionally when Nicole pushed to hard.

Nicole started to feel bored. She stroked Sarah’s hair back into some order and squeezed her like a stress ball a few times. When she was done, she slipped her into her pocket for safekeeping.
15121111112.title: Nicole enlarges Sarah to eight inches

151211111122.content:
“Well, that was fun,” Nicole stated flatly, “I did enjoy your stringy stuff. You’re kinda boring now that you want to sleep.” Nicole squeezed Sarah for effect. “I think I will go collect Emma. We are studying people in biology and it might be good to get two of you so I can play some games. Like see what you look like as a baby, or an old lady, without completely destroying my toy.”

This caught Sarah’s attention, “please leave my sister alone!”

Nicole chuckled, “You’re cute, dollie.” She looked down at her desk and lifted up a q-tip as big as a pugtle stick. “You can’t even stop me from doing this.” She flipped Sarah over in her hand. She licked the tip of the q-tip and inserted it into her butt.

Sarah screamed from the shock as much as anything else, because the q-tip didn’t hurt. “Quiet down little baby.”

Nicole plucked out the q-tip and studied the brown smudge on it. She gave it a sniff, “not bad doll, but I have to go.”

Nicole chuckled as she tossed Sarah into a jewelry box and left.
151211111122.title: Toss Sarah into the toybox

choices: Nicole and Emma Capture a Game
1512111111221.content:
Sarah moaned from the pain of the impact. Nicole threw her into the jewelry box. She felt some warmth and wetness on her leg. Reaching down she found a giant earring stabbed in her calf. With a firm pull, the jewelry came free.

As she sat in the dark, she had nothing to keep her company but her thoughts. She worried about what Nicole would do with her sister. She claimed she ate Holly, but who knows if she was telling the truth. Given the way she stretched her back to eight inches tall, clearly Nicole had some magical powers. Perhaps she was behind everything. Sarah was overcome with the desire to sleep and drifted off.

Some time later, minutes, hours, or days, Sarah heard Nicole come through the door, she was laughing and talking loudly. “That ball game was so much fun, wasn’t it Em?”

Sarah’s heart stopped, Nicole had brought her sister home. She sighed when she heard her sister respond at a normal pitch, so she wasn’t shrunk...yet, “Yeah, they all started running! How did they all fall asleep like that?”

“Oh, I have my way over folks.” Nicole chuckled, ‘Speaking of which, Em, do you want to see this model of you that I made?”

“Absolutely Nikki!”

Light flooded into the box, followed by a giant fingers like pink tipped tentacles. Before Sarah could react, she found herself in four simultaneous bear hugs, then lifted from her prison.

It took a minute for her eyes to adjust, but when they did she saw her face staring back in awe, mouth slightly agape. “Wow Nikk, how did you make this copy of me?”

Sarah screamed, “I’m your twin, Emma! It’s me, Sarah. This giant captured me, flee now!”

Emma chuckled and grabbed a sky blue painted big toe, “This silly thing thinks she is my sister? That’s a fun trick Nicole.”

Nicole smiled, “I thought you would enjoy that. Why wouldn’t a little copy of you think that its your twin!”

Emma was tickled by this. She drove her parents crazy enough by herself, how could they take two of her. “Can I touch her?”

Nicole pushed Sarah into Emma’s palm. She was crying because she couldn’t believe her sister would forget that she existed. Emma held Sarah in her left hand. Using her left thumb, she started stroking her belly. “She is so cute.”

With her right index finger and thumb, she pinched Sarah’s wrist and pulled it forward. “She has got such beautiful, tiny manicure. I love the sky blue color. How did they paint her nails when they are so small?”

Nicole clapped Emma on the back, “It’s attention to detail. She is almost lifelike. Wiggle your fingers, doll” Sarah gave Nicole a nasty look. “Listen doll, you play, or I do what you don’t want, if you know what I mean.” Nicole nodded in Emma’s direction. Sarah began wiggling her fingers.

Emma was thrilled. Using her index finger she touched each of the wiggling tiny fingers. Then she traced her finger back the doll’s palm to forearm to arm. She squeezed her bicep between her finger and thumb, “She is pretty well built.”

“Put her down, Em, I am certain she will give us a floor routine.”

Em smiled as she sat her down on the table. She pulled up a chair and put her face as close as possible. “Get going doll,” said Nicole.

Sarah started with a cartwheel, eliciting an ooh from her giant sister. Then she continued with some tumbles, attracting an aww. Sarah started tearing up as she could always count on Emma cheering her on at competitions. Having her not remember anything broke her heart.

She ended in a handstand. As she held this pose, a giant finger poked her in the vagina. This would have caused her to fall back if another hand hadn’t plucked her up by the ankles. “She is cute here too. Although I have not seen another girl naked before.” Emma said.

“She makes this fun stringy liquid, almost like slime. Maybe we can make her more later.”

“She makes it from here?” Emma asked astounded.

Nicole nodded and smiled, “Yep! It’s so much fun.”

Emma smiled as she poked her twin as Sarah’s face became flush from the blood running to her head. Emma then started swinging her back and forth as a pendulum. Emma put her finger out to feel Sarah’s arms pass as her body swung back and forth.

Emma then grabbed one of Sarah’s tiny hands and lifted her to be parallel with the floor. She shook the tiny body to watch it jiggle. “She is really athletic!”

“Hey Em, would you want to stay over?” Nicole asked.

“Absolutely!! Can I continue playing with this doll?”

Nicole smirked, “You can play with her as much as you want, as long as we can play together.”

Emma smiled.
1512111111221.title: Emma Joins the Fun

15121111112211.content:
Emma continued to play with Sarah, oblivious to the fact she was her sister. Emma was thrilled to play with a doll identical to her, with the exception of nail color. Sarah was sky blue, Emma’s was purple.

Hours passed and their was a knock at the door. Nicole grabbed the door and ushered Lauren, the girls’ mother to the bedroom. “Hello Emma,” Lauren said, “Where’s Sarah? It’s time to go.”

“Huh, this doll’s name is Sarah, is this who you mean?” Emma held up the dollie and shook her for good measure causing her limbs and boobies to shake pleasingly to Emma.

Lauren covered her mouth in shock as she reached out for the doll. “I wouldn’t if I were you,” commented Nicole, “You’re shrinking too and if you touch her, you will cause her to shrink more.”

Nicole saw Lauren pull back her hand and tear up. “Just give it a minute and will have the perfect doll family, isn’t that right, Emma?”p

Emma nodded, no longer recognizing her mother either, “This woman is absolutely beautiful, your one lucky girl to have this doll.”

Wrapping her hand around the mature woman, who now stood 12 inches tall, she couldn’t help but agree.
15121111112211.title: Emma Joins Her Sister

1512111112.content:
"Hey, Nicole," You start, slightly annoyed, "I really need help getting home. Could we maybe...not do this right now?"

"You...want to leave...?" Nicole's enthusiasm drops from her like a ton of bricks. "But...I thought we were going to be...friends!"

"We-We can still be friends, it's just..." You can see she's getting unhappy really fast, and try to keep her from getting angry.

"Well fine," Nicole begins...
1512111112.title: Don't Anger a Giant Girl

choices: "...but, honestly, you're really not anything to me anymore." (Death)
"...you can be my slave until I decide to help though." (Torture)
15121111121.content:
"Well, fine!!" Nicole shouts, tossing you down on her desk rather forcefully. She stands over you, and you can see her bellybutton just creeping out from under her shirt at your level. You look up and it's like the face of death is staring at you.

"Please, don't be mad," You try to calm her down, "I just need help..." You are starting to feel like this was a mistake.

"...Help, huh..." Nicole puts on a sly smile, "I guess I can help you..."
15121111121.title: Angrily (you're not leaving)

choices: Not quick enough! She grabs you in her fist.
151211111211.content: Your face turns pale instantly. Nicole doesn't see you as a friend. Heck, she barely sees you as a life. Your worthless. Quick! While Nicole thinks of what to do with you, you...
151211111211.title: "...but, honestly, you're really not an...

choices: Is tapping her foot...(She will stomp you flat)
Hears her stomach rumbing...(She will eat you)
1512111112112.content:
Before you can even move, Nicole clenches you in a fist of murderous intent. She looks at you with her striking blue eyes, down into your pitiful tiny brown ones. You are on the verge of crying, just out of the overall helpless feeling you have. Nothing is going to save you except a miracle.You think of the life you're leaving behind. If only you didn't wake up like this...your whole life was ahead of you! Now, you will surely die, at the hands of a girl your age.

Nicole...
1512111112112.title: Not quick enough! She grabs you in her fist.

15121111121121.content:
You try to struggle in Nicole’s hand, however, she squeezes you until you’re all out of energy. Once she sees that you are no longer able to struggle, she drops you onto the ground. You look up just enough to see her foot. It had been tapping, but suddenly stopped, scaring you. Nicole lifted up her foot and moved it over you.

“Nicole, please don’t do this.” You tried to say. Suddenly, you felt a sharp pain on you legs.

“I don’t listen to pathetic bugs, I only crush them with my feet.” She said before crushing your arm. Nicole suddenly started to giggle. You struggled to turn onto your back. Once you had, you could see the bottom of her shoe. You could see a little dirt and your blood on it. You also could see Nicole’s unforgiving smile. “Goodbye little bug.” Nicole said, before bringing her foot down. You didn’t have the energy to scream as Nicole stepped on you, crushing the rest of the bones in your body.

—————————

Nicole finished the girl off. She rubbed her foot on her, just to make sure she was gone. Finally, Nicole’s anger had been calmed down. Nicole went back to playing, giving no attention to what she just did. After all, nobody would know the truth. As Nicole grew up, she eventually believed the incident to be a dream, forgetting that it was real.
15121111121121.title: A simple bug simply needs crushing

15121111121122.content:
You hear Nicole's stomach rumbling fiercely. Oh crap! She left her snack to deal with you, now she is surely hungry. Nicole smiles devilishly, and brings you up, tilting her head back so that you dangle over her dark, cavernous open mouth. You see her glistening white teeth ready to welcome you to your doom.

"Please, don't do this! I'm...I'm sorry!" You scream, crying.

Nicole looks at you...
15121111121122.title: Nicole eats you

151211111211222.content:
"To my stomach you go, Sarah!" Nicole drops you and you land with a thud against her slimy wet tongue. Nicole shuts her mouth, trapping you in total darkness. It doesn't appear as though she'll chew you, so you struggle to run to the front of her mouth, and you only land a few punches in to her teeth before being flicked back by the tongue. Nicole then swishes you around, until you are drenched in saliva. You are sobbing at this point. How could someone be so cruel...

Nicole smiles again and gulps you down. You are pushed downward by the muscles in her throat, and are unable to move until that dreadful drop into her stomach. Immediately, you cover your mouth to shield a little from the humid stench of the "air". Nicole's stomach is almost like a big cave to you. As you walk around in the faintly-illuminated land of death, you step into, and then immediately back out of, a thick, deep pool of digested Doritos and stomach acids. You know that your eventual turning into that is inevitable, though...

Outside, Nicole rubs and pats her belly, feeling your struggling and walking inside. Her stomach gurgles satisfyingly, considering you a protein-packed, well-needed and filling snack. She kicks aside a toy on the floor as she walks back to her bed.

You, in a hysterical fit of anger and sadness, wail around, punching and kicking all around her stomach, in the hopes of making her sick. However, Nicole's stomach is stronger than you, sending you tumbling around with its huge shaking rumbles.

Nicole laughs at the tickling you are giving her tummy. After a while, you make her belch really loudly; an impressive burp for a young girl. After that, you realize that Nicole's stomach is going to win, so you give up and sink into the stomach acid.

An hour later, Nicole's stomach has completely digested you, and she quickly forgets even knowing you. After a day or two, she begins hearing about you missing on the news and around town, and looks down at her belly, holding the secret to your disappearance...
151211111211222.title: Eaten, truly eaten

151212.content:
"Sure." You hear the mother say. However, in contrary to your theory, the girl does in fact go for one of the toppled cereals, meaning that you're not going anywhere! A jump down fast enough onto that box to ensure you a ride with them would certainly injure you, if not lead to your death, so you can't do that.

You watch as the girl and her mother walk further down the aisle and then out of your field of view. Well, looks like you're waiting for the next one.

And a next one does come soon after! A 10-year-old boy walks through the aisle with his father and asks to get a box of cereal.

Is it yours?
151212.title: A box near you

choices: Pretend that it didn't fall on the floor.
152.content: You decide that you're more likely to be noticed in the bakery, so that's where you go. The air in the bakery is stale, but it smells of freshly baked rolls and cookies. You are just admiring the smell when you see a massive lump of dough falling from directly overhead. You try to avoid the falling mass, but are simply not fast enough. The mass of sticky dough falls onto you, pressing you into the ground forcefully. You struggle to move, but the sticky substance is too thick for you to move at all. Suddenly the dough is lifted into the air, and you along with it, by a baker. What does the baker do?
152.title: Caught by dough

choices: You got free and ran to a hiding place
You couldn’t get free and were soon placed in the oven
You couldn’t get free but were noticed by the baker
1522.content:
You struggle as the dough is lifted up. You’re afraid that you’re going to get thrown away, but after a minute you’re able to tell that that’s not the case. The baker places the dough on a counter, unaware of your presence.

“Hopefully nobody saw that.” The baker said. You have a pretty good view of your captor. It was a female baker with short brown hair. Before you could tell to get her attention, she starting rolling the dough to increase it’s length. Her movements made it dizzy and a little hard to breathe. Once she was done, she stepped away for a moment.

“I need to get out of here.” You thought to yourself. Though you were still young, you were smart enough to know she would soon place the dough and you into the oven. If you were in there’s, you would either burn to death or soon be eaten and digested away. You struggled like crazy trying to get free, knowing that the warden was coming back.
1522.title: Dough rolling

choices: Another baker suddenly swats at you, causing you to fly into a muffin pan
Another baker suddenly swats at you, causing you to fly into some cookie dough
Another baker suddenly swats at you, making you fly towards the woman’s breasts
You make it to the hand and start climbing it
You make it to the hand and bite it to get her attention
15221.content:
As you struggled, you could feel yourself slowly getting free. You suddenly noticed the baker coming back, causing you to panic. You struggled even more, not wanting to become food. The baker picked up the dough, causing you to scream. With all of your strength, you gave one last struggle allowing you to become free. You fell onto the table and immediately ran behind a bag of baking soda. The baker hadn’t noticed you and walked away with your former prison.

You trembled a little, thinking about how close you were to the oven. You sat down and took a deep breath. Once you were calmed down, you decided to take a look around. Though you were fully aware that you had shrunk before, this was the first time you were really taking it in. Everything was so big, and you were about the size of a paper clip.

You got up and looked at the bakers. When comparing sizes, you were pretty insignificant. It would be very difficult to get anybody’s attention. Even still, you felt it would be your best chance. You suddenly spotted a blond baker looking at a cookbook and smiled. You started to run towards her hand, hoping for the best.
15221.title: A small girl in a humongous kitchen

choices: The blonde giantess picks you up and decides to taste your cookie dough
The blonde giantess picks you up and notices some sort of bug in the dough
The giantess shakes her head and brings the pan to the oven
The head chef appears and tells them to serve free cookie dough to the customers
You get free and find your way onto the blonde woman’s hand
152212.content:
You started to get close to the giant hand, making you feel hopeful. However, you weren’t entirely sure what you were actually going to do when you got to her hand. You suddenly felt a chill down your spine and became confused. As you started to turn, a giant hand slammed into you causing you to go flying.

“Stupid greedy bugs.” A giant voice said. You landed on a soft surface face first. You stayed still for a moment before you got up and looked around. The giant hand had thrown you into a tub of cookie dough.The owner of the voice was a teenage girl with ginger hair. The blonde baker gave her a worried look.

“Careful, if the boss hears anything about bugs, we could be fired.” The blonde woman said. Her friend chuckled.

“Oh please, I took care of that pathetic creature.”

“That’s kind of what worries me.”

Your belly suddenly grumbled. With all of the commotion, you didn’t realize how hungry you were. You grabbed a piece of cookie dough and ate it.

“I should move while I can but…this stuff tastes so good.” You thought to yourself. You ate another piece and burped. As you continued to devour the surface, the blonde giantess gave a nod to herself and put some gloves on. You didn’t have time to react as she quickly grabbed a large portion of the dough next to you. You screamed and quickly backed up, looking up at the baker.

She rolled it up into a ball and set it down on a cookie sheet. Her friend licked her lips, eyeing the sweets. You quickly dodged out of the way as the giant hand returned for a second scoop. You continued to do this a couple more times before collapsing in exhaustion. You snapped your eyes shit as the giant hand grabbed some more cookie dough along with you.

The giantess started to roll your gooey cage into a ball. You thought it would hurt but it was actually quite relaxing. When the baker put it down on the sheet, you were on the outside. Your hands, feet, waist and neck were being covered by your prison. You became nervous as the ginger Titan seemed to eye you.

“Well, bon appetite.” She said. The giantess grabbed the ball next to you and popped it into her mouth.

“Penny!” The blonde giantess said with great concern. Her friend simply smiled and moaned at the taste. She chewed her food with ease before gulping it down.

“Relax, we have plenty of cookie dough. Try one, you’ll like it.” The woman looked at the pan as if considering it. Your fear swiftly returned as you remembered what your situation was and what would happen to you. You pulled your arm out and smiled, it was easier than last time. You start to reach for your other arm.
152212.title: Preparing tasty cookie dough

1522123.content:
As the blonde giantess considered her options, you successfully freed your other arm. You start to free your legs when the baker suddenly picked up your piece. As you became level with her mouth, you froze.

Her warm breath surrounded you, making you shiver in fear. You had a visual of her massive tongue and strong teeth. She suddenly licked her lips as if teasing you. You quickly closed your eyes and turned your head away.

“Oh just get it over with!” You yelled, despite knowing she wouldn’t hear. After a few moments though, the giantess suddenly set you back down. You opened your eyes, feeling confused.

“I’m sorry Penny, it’s just that I don’t want to get fired.” She said, picking up the tray. You frantically struggled to get out once more, knowing where you were going.

“Eh, suit yourself.” The other giantess said, shrugging. The baker moved to the oven and opened it up. As she started to slide the cookie sheet into the oven, you finally popped out of your gooey prison. You ran to the edge as fast as you could.

“WAIT PLEASE! I’M NOT FOOD!” You shrieked. You helplessly watched as the entrance was sealed shut. You hesitated before holding yourself. There was no way out and if you fell, you would certainly burn.

As things started to heat up, you pulled off your shirt, hoping to get rid of some of the heat. You stripped down to your underwear and tossed your clothes off the edge. Before you had time to think, the ground started to burn your feet. You yelled and ran onto a piece of food. Though the cookie dough was really hot, it wasn’t as bad as the actual ground.

“I don’t know what’s worse, burning to death or getting devoured alive.” You said to yourself. You laid down and closed your eyes, soon falling asleep.

You soon woke up to a loud sound. You opened your eyes and looked around. Your skin was red, but seemed to be fine for now. The cookies were no longer in the oven, but were now on display. As you tried to get up, you suddenly realized you were stuck in a now solid and cooked prison.

“I’ll take two chocolate chip cookies please.” A male voice suddenly said. Your eyes focused enough to see the man behind the display case along with some other people in the store. Two cookies to your left were collected and given to him. “Thank you.”

You started to struggle out of your cookie. It wouldn’t be long before someone purchased you for dessert. You kind of wished someone would just crush you instead of eating you. As you tried to pull out, a finger suddenly pointed at you.

“I’ll take that one.” The voice said. It belonged to…
1522123.title: The life of a cookie

choices: She shoved the rest of the cookie into her mouth and swallowed
You managed to break free but the girl went after you and the crumbs around you
The girl decided to save the rest of the cookie for later
Her mother suddenly took the cookie away saying she had enough sweets today
You managed to break free and get to safety
15221231.content:
The girl looked to be about your age. She had short ginger hair and looked pretty cute. She licked her lips, eyeing your tasty ride. As the employee pulled out your cookie, you started to shake. Time was running out, you would soon end up as candy.

“Thank you!” She said. As the girl grabbed you, her warm breath surrounded you, surprisingly calming you down. Her breath was warm and smelled like sweets. If you were to become food, there were definitely worse predators out there.

The girl sat down at a table, waiting for her mother to finish up. She sniffed the cookie before giving it a lick. You shuddered, feeling her mighty tongue. The girl licked her lips before taking a bite out of the cookie. Your fear had returned once more as she had just missed your feet.

You started to struggle, searching for some hope. Even if you were doomed, you’d rather go down fighting. Within a few seconds, the cookie around your legs broke off. You smiled and started to kick wildly. The giant girl swallowed her bite and licked you once more. You froze for a second, still trembling a little. You had no idea if she was aware of you or not. If she did, she was doing a very good job teasing you.

The giant child turned the cookie and took another bite, this time just missing your head. You watched as she slowly chewed it up, savoring the taste. She swallowed the bits of cookie before smiling.
15221231.title: Very close to an innocent mouth

15222.content:
You groan and try your hardest to pull yourself out of the dough but it was way too sticky for your tiny body to pull out of. Your eyes widen in horror as the baker shaped the dough that contained you into a pretzel shape and put it in the oven along with other similar bunches of dough, and then closed the oven door.

You panic and try again to pull yourself out of the dough as fast as you could. You definitely don't want to be cooked alive! However, with every one of your limbs is stuck in dough and only your face and knees being free, you have no means to tear through the dough!

Soon you see the "room"s walls glow red and the whole area starts heating up. You scream and cry: "Please! Help me! Mommy! Daddy!" But no one could hear you and no one responded.

Minutes pass after the over gets warmer and warmer until finally you get a glimmer of hope as you notice the dough you're in starts to get darker and harden. You gasp and quickly attempt to break through the dough and to get out of this mess! You would have to figure out later how to open the over door but your first priority is to get out of that terrible prison.

You pull with all your strength and manage to break one arm out of the hardened dough and you try to use that arm to help your other arm out. You almost manage before you start feeling the heat get to incredibly painful levels and you can't help but scream your lungs out. By now your body is full of burns as you can see on your hand... You try to push through the pain anyway but... You can't.
You are overwhelmed with the pain and pass out soon after.

You don't wake up after that. And you didn't even make that good of a snack. So it's safe to call this a bad ending.
15222.title: One cooked tiny girl, coming right up!

info.brief_description: Who knows what could happen when an eight year old girl shrinks?
info.description:
Hello hello, abc314 here with a word with regard to the age of the characters involved in this story. Since all of the characters involved in this story are fully fictional, if you object to the ages it should be easy to imagine that the characters are older than they are described as being (maybe they just look young). Several great stories have been lost to people reporting them as child pornography, which this story does not aspire to be, and I would like it if this story did not join the ranks of the dead.

Special thanks to Nine, who has added dozens of fantastic chapters, and ShrinkingGirl, who helped me realize the merit of changing person. You both rock!

Characters:
Sarah (you): An eight year old girl who finds herself mysteriously reduced to a bit under an inch and a half tall.
Emma (prefers to be called Em): Sarah's identical twin sister. Both twins have brown hair and blue eyes, though Emma's comes down about two inches past her shoulders while Sarah's is about half as long.
Rachel: The twins' fourteen year old sister. Rachel has green eyes and blond hair that reaches about halfway down her back. Rachel isn't very nice, but as a general rule would not hurt her siblings.
Lauren: The girls' mother. She is 37, with short, dark hair and blue eyes. A loving mother, but absentminded: she rarely thinks things through before doing them.
Mark: Lauren's 38 year old husband. Mark is on a business trip for two weeks, and should not appear in the story.
Kaylee: Sarah, Emma, and Rachel's four year old cousin. She has vivid blue eyes, thin, curly, blond hair, and is only halfway potty trained.

More characters can appear through the story as is needed, these are just Sarah and her immediate family.

Please don't be scared off by the rules, add something to the story. Please. Every single chapter counts so much!

Rules:
Sarah can be killed.
Remember that Sarah is only eight years old.
While I prefer to write in second person, and most of the interactive is written in this manner, there are times when third person is more appropriate, and you may write in second or third person. Please don't write in first person, it just feels weird to read.
Please do not use links to external images in your chapters. It can be tempting to do so, but it detracts from the storytelling aspect and the images may not remain up forever, which can lead to ambiguity. Words won't change over time, web addresses might, so please use your words instead of images.

One more thing: If a chapter has slightly flawed grammar and/or spelling, I might make some very minor changes without informing the author. I will never delete a chapter or make any major change without telling its author.

I'll try to be as active as possible, so if you write a review you can expect to receive recognition for it. I'll always answer emails.

Note: All characters in this story are strictly works of fiction. Any similarities between the characters in this story and any person, real or fictional, is purely coincidental. Don't sue me!

UPDATES:
-- This interactive is now officially one year old! Yay!
-- 100 chapters! Incredible!
-- Rules changed to be more lenient due to lack of recent chapter additions. Please add!
-- Two years of A Little Girl now! I changed the title to have all three words have uppercase letters at the start, and I also added a paragraph at the beginning of this section. We also hit 150 chapters!
-- 200 chapters?! I'm blown away. The support that this story has received is far greater than I could have ever hoped, and I'm very grateful for everyone's additions.
-- Third person is now permitted where it seems appropriate.
-- We have reached 250 chapters and 30,000 views. That's stunning. Thank you everyone who has added for making this story become something big!
-- Three years now. Very cool.
-- We've now reached four years and counting of this story. It's hard to believe that it has been here for this long!
-- I went on a bit of a writing spree and exceeded 300 chapters! We're one of the bigger shrink interactives on the site now! This is really neat!
-- Added a rule about using links to external images in chapters.
